# Voice & Tone: ArtFrost

## Brand Personality
*   **Visionary yet Grounded**: We speak about the future of tech, but we deliver concrete results today.
*   **Sophisticated**: Use precise language. Avoid slang, but avoid overly dry academic text.
*   **"Cool" Confidence**: Like the name "Frost", the tone is calm, collected, and sharp.

## Copywriting Rules
*   **Headings**: Short, punchy, often 2-5 words. (e.g., "Future-Driven Development", not "We provide development driven by the future").
*   **CTAs**: Action-oriented. (e.g., "Get Started", "Explore Now").
*   **Descriptions**: Focus on *value* and *transformation*, not just specs.

## Terminology
| Avoid | Use |
| :--- | :--- |
| "Coding services" | "Digital Solutions" |
| "I make websites" | "I craft digital experiences" |
| "Cheap" | "Efficient / Scalable" |
| "Future" (repetitively) | "Next-Gen", "Forward-thinking", "Modern" |
